message:
SYSTEM: 03_SPARQL.pdf: Página 53
Introduction 
•  How many of you have been in the need of making 
queries to distributed SPARQL endpoints? 
 
   Example 
 
•  Using the Pubmed references obtained from the Geneid gene 
dataset, retrieve information about genes and their references in the 
Pubmed dataset.  
•  From Pubmed we access the information in the National Library of 
Medicine’s controlled vocabulary thesaurus, stored at the MeSH 
endpoint, so we have more complete information about such genes.  
•  Finally, we also access the HHPID endpoint, which is the knowledge 
base for the HIV-1 protein.
speaker: SYSTEM
